lead_paragraph: GOLDSMITH--Barbara. The Board of Trustees and staff of The New York Society Library mourn the loss of Barbara Goldsmith, an acclaimed author and a Library Board member for 17 years. Her artistry, generosity, and dedication to the city's literary life live on. 1/3
